summary: The epic story of a family separated as a result of the Great Tangshan Earthquake of 1976.
cast: Fan Xu|Jingchu Zhang|Chen Li|Zifeng Zhang|Jiajun Zhang|Yi Lu|Guoqiang Zhang|Ziwen Wang|Lixin Yang|Zhong Lü|Mei Yong|Lili Liu|Daoming Chen|Jin Chen|Baowen Zhang|Qiuzi Ma|Jing Lü|David F. Morris|Tie-Dan|Le Yang
title: Tang shan da di zhen
